com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.physics.collision

Class CollisionWorld3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.physics.collision.CollisionWorld3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class CollisionWorld3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Stores and handles collision bodies.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)
